subject: [Radiance-general] materials in radiance softwar
body:
Hi,
concerning values for specularity and roughness from measured scattering
data, you might find
http://www.pab.eu/gonio-photometer/demodata/bme/ useful.
It gives numbers of both for some materials. They depend on incident
direction for most materials, but that's actually a problem of the model
rather of the materials and their data.

best regards
Peter
